alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Deaf Smith; Oldham; Palo Duro Canyon; Potter; Randall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued February 27 at 8:12PM CST until February 28 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 8 PM CST TUESDAY FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR THE SOUTHWESTERN TO SOUTH-CENTRAL TEXAS PANHANDLE... ...RED FLAG WARNING HAS EXPIRED FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR THE SOUTHWESTERN TO SOUTH-CENTRAL TEXAS PANHANDLE... * Affected Area...In Texas...Oldham...Potter...Deaf Smith... Randall...Armstrong and Palo Duro Canyon. * 20 Foot Winds...West 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 11 percent. * Red Flag Threat Index...3 to 6. * Timing...10 AM through 8 PM CST Tuesday.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now...or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures will create favorable weather for rapid fire growth and spread. Avoid activities that promote open flames and sparks.

area.areaDesc: Armstrong; Deaf Smith; Oldham; Palo Duro Canyon; Potter; Randall
